message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Given its value to you, we are confident it's worth more than $10,000. After careful consideration, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $11,500. This price reflects the balance between fair compensation for us and an attractive offer for you. We understand the importance of this decision and are committed to ensuring a smooth transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.
